words_with_ee_ea_ie_1.meaning_en: a hoofed grazing or browsing animal, typically having branched bony antlers that are shed annually and are borne only by the male in most species
words_with_ee_ea_ie_1.example_en: The deer leaped over the fence.
words_with_ee_ea_ie_1.example_vi: Con hươu nhảy qua hàng rào.

words_with_ee_ea_ie_1.meaning_en: a bloodsucking worm or a person who clings to another for personal gain
words_with_ee_ea_ie_1.example_en: The leech attached itself to the fish.
words_with_ee_ea_ie_1.example_vi: Con đỉa bám vào con cá.

words_with_ee_ea_ie_1.meaning_en: a young male cattle raised for beef; or to guide or control the course of something
words_with_ee_ea_ie_1.meaning_vi: bò đực non; lái, điều khiển
words_with_ee_ea_ie_1.example_en: He learned to steer the boat skillfully.
words_with_ee_ea_ie_1.example_vi: Anh ấy học cách lái thuyền một cách khéo léo.

words_with_ee_ea_ie_1.meaning_en: having the pleasant taste of sugar; or pleasing in general
words_with_ee_ea_ie_1.example_en: The sweet aroma of flowers filled the air.
words_with_ee_ea_ie_1.example_vi: Hương thơm ngọt ngào của hoa tràn ngập không khí.

words_with_ee_ea_ie_1.meaning_en: covered or saturated with water or another liquid
words_with_ee_ea_ie_1.example_en: Her clothes were wet after the rain.
words_with_ee_ea_ie_1.example_vi: Quần áo của cô ấy ướt sau cơn mưa.

words_with_ee_ea_ie_1.meaning_en: a small, wingless, bloodsucking insect that jumps
words_with_ee_ea_ie_1.example_en: The dog was scratching because of a flea.
words_with_ee_ea_ie_1.example_vi: Con chó gãi vì có bọ chét.

words_with_ee_ea_ie_1.meaning_en: to intend to convey or refer to; or unkind, spiteful
words_with_ee_ea_ie_1.meaning_vi: có nghĩa là; keo kiệt, ác ý
words_with_ee_ea_ie_1.example_en: His words were mean and hurtful.
words_with_ee_ea_ie_1.example_vi: Lời nói của anh ta ác ý và làm tổn thương.

words_with_ee_ea_ie_1.meaning_en: having the power to move heavy weights or perform other physically demanding tasks
words_with_ee_ea_ie_1.example_en: She is strong enough to lift the box.
words_with_ee_ea_ie_1.example_vi: Cô ấy đủ mạnh để nâng cái hộp.

words_with_ee_ea_ie_1.meaning_en: a person who steals another person's property
words_with_ee_ea_ie_1.example_en: The thief escaped with the jewels.
words_with_ee_ea_ie_1.example_vi: Kẻ trộm trốn thoát với số trang sức.
